title: ‘If I Were a Tennis Player, My Career Would Be Over’: Remco Evenepoel Battles Back from Hidden Injury
content:
Evenepoel reveals nerve damage in the same shoulder he injured at Itzulia last year will require heavy taping: 'I'm for sure behind my top shape.'

Read the full article at ‘If I Were a Tennis Player, My Career Would Be Over’: Remco Evenepoel Battles Back from Hidden Injury on Velo.
author: ahood
